name: Bomber Cats
description:
Welcome to Bomber Cats

Bomber Cats is a  grid based competetive  online fighting game.

At the start of every game, you and all other players can choose a team-colour.

You can play  with 2-8 players.

Your goal is to eliminate the enemy team with your bombs!

You can drop bombs by pressing space, the normal bombs will detonate in 3 seconds after dropped.

Items will help you get stronger and more dangerous!

Beware not every item helps you!
